Class Payment

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.Payment
public class Payment extends Object
Represents a payment transaction in the flight booking system. This class stores payment details including card information and amount. All fields are immutable to ensure payment record integrity.

  • Constructor Details

    • Payment

      public Payment(int bookingId, double amount, String cardNumber, String expiryDate, LocalDate paymentDate)
      Constructs a new Payment with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - the ID of the booking being paid for
      amount - the payment amount
      cardNumber - the credit card number (16 digits)
      expiryDate - the card expiry date (MM/YY format)
      paymentDate - the date when payment was processed

  • Method Details

    • getBookingId

      public int getBookingId()
      Returns:
      the booking ID this payment is for

      the payment amount

      public LocalDate getPaymentDate()
      Returns:
      the date when payment was processed

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the payment. For security, only shows last 4 digits of the card number.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      formatted string with payment details
